Method.name: GetTopXSql
Method.summary: Returns the SQL required to fetch the first records out of the table.
Method.param: The number of records to fetch

Method.name: GetCommand
Method.summary: Returns a DbCommand of the appropriate API type initialized with the given SQL CommandText.

Method.name: GetDataAdapter
Method.summary: Returns a DbDataAdapter of the appropriate API type (e.g. SqlDataAdapter for sql server).

Method.name: GetCommandBuilder
Method.summary: Returns a DbCommandBuilder of the appropriate API type (e.g. SqlCommandBuilder for sql server)

Method.name: GetParameter
Method.summary: Returns a DbParameter of the appropriate API type (e.g. SqlParameter for sql server)
